solution_line_template: Ana charged her phone halfway, so she took {phone_full_charge_minutes} / {halfway_divisor} = <<{phone_full_charge_minutes}/{halfway_divisor}={phone_half_charge_minutes}>>{phone_half_charge_minutes} minutes to charge her phone.

Thus, it took Ana {phone_half_charge_minutes} + {tablet_full_charge_minutes} = <<{phone_half_charge_minutes}+{tablet_full_charge_minutes}={total_charge_minutes}>>{total_charge_minutes} minutes to charge her phone and tablet.
